title: For the love of Benji
creator_credit: Mulberry Square, Ben Vaughn and Joe Camp
brief_description: In this sequel to the popular family movie “Benji”, our furry friend is in store for more heart stopping adventures. When holidaying in Greece with ladyfriend Tiffany and his newly adopted family, Benji and his friend are off to a bad start when they become embroiled in an international spy ring. Starring Cynthia Smith, Allen Fiuzat, Patsy Garrett and Ed Nelson.
